text: Phenopelopidae is a family of mites and ticks in the order Sarcoptiformes. There are at least 4 genera and 90 described species in Phenopelopidae. ==Genera== * Eupelops Ewing, 1917 * Nesopelops Hammer, 1973 * Peloptulus Berlese, 1908 * Propelops Jacot, 1937 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Sarcoptiformes
title: Phenopelopidae
